name: Puzzled Past
description:
Puzzled Past was one of my first projects made with Unity.

It's just a small prototype made in a few weeks during which I was learning to use Unity for the first time. I made all the programming, while two other students made most of the assets.

It's a puzzle game in which you have to fix historical pictures to progress.
There is also an educational side to it as you can learn about the events depicted in the pictures you're fixing through the game.
